overview: Bhua Ek Te Fufad Do is a Punjabi comedy-drama movie directed by Hadev Tohra. The movie features Amrit Alam, Balwinder, Lakhwinder, Nikka, and Surjit in the lead roles. Released in 2007, Bhua Ek Te Fufad Do Punjabi movie was a success at the box office and was hit commercially as well as critically. It was highly praised for the hilarious story along with the performances of the lead actors.
title: Bhua Ek Te Fufad Do
